name: OCKSimpleTaskViewController
desc: A view controller that displays and updates a single event, which can be completed or uncompleted by tapping a large button.

items.name: init(task: OCKAnyTask, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a view controller that has a specific task.

items.name: init(taskID: String, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a view controller that has a task identifier.

items.name: init(taskIDs: [String], eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a view controller that has an array of task identifiers.

items.name: init(viewSynchronizer: OCKSimpleTaskViewSynchronizer, task: OCKAnyTask, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new task view controller that has a specific synchronizer, task, and query.

items.name: init(viewSynchronizer: OCKSimpleTaskViewSynchronizer, taskID: String, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new task view controller that has a specific synchronizer, task identifier, and query.

items.name: init(viewSynchronizer: OCKSimpleTaskViewSynchronizer, taskIDs: [String], eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new task view controller that has a specific synchronizer, array of task identifier, and query.
